title: Global Kleptocratic Coordination Through Crypto Markets
description: Document how cryptocurrency markets enable international oligarchs, authoritarian regimes, and kleptocratic networks to coordinate influence operations in American politics without traditional intelligence vulnerabilities.
research_areas: Which international actors show coordinated crypto trading patterns?
How do Russian, Chinese, and Saudi networks participate in US crypto influence?
What evidence exists of cross-border kleptocratic coordination?
How do authoritarian regimes use crypto to interfere in democratic processes?
What operational security advantages does crypto provide to foreign influence?
source_requirements: International trading patterns, cross-border transaction analysis, intelligence reports, coordination evidence
pdf_source: The Capture Cascade - Part 5_ The Breakthrough.pdf
